name: 2D Platformer Early Version 1
description:
This is an early version of a 2D Platformer game designed by Ryan Corsiglia

All assets used were provided by the CAS 117 class.

Proposed Modifications for Version 2

1. New and advanced levels that have more complex goals and are slightly more difficult. (Maybe including a boss fight).

2.  Add more enemies that range from easy to hard to beat difficulty.

3. Possibly new power ups, such as pickups for speed, damage increase, etc.
